code: // ------------------------------------------------------------------------ @Override public Long getValue() {     final JobStatus status = eg.getState().     if (status == JobStatus.RUNNING) {         // running right now - no downtime         return 0L.     } else if (status.isTerminalState()) {         // not running any more -> finished or not on leader         return NO_LONGER_RUNNING.     } else {         final long runningTimestamp = eg.getStatusTimestamp(JobStatus.RUNNING).         if (runningTimestamp > 0) {             // we use 'Math.max' here to avoid negative timestamps when clocks change             return Math.max(System.currentTimeMillis() - runningTimestamp, 0).         } else {             // job was never scheduled so far             return NOT_YET_RUNNING.         }     } }
